articles.content: A former lover of Marilyn Manson has claimed she was approached by his accusers as part of what his lawyer calls an alleged conspiracy to defame the singer, who is battling several sexual assault law… [+6815 chars]

articles.author: Adele Ankers
articles.title: Gang Heist $330,000 Worth of Netflix Equipment From Lupin Set - IGN
articles.description: A gang of masked thieves ambushed the set of the Netflix heist drama Lupin, stealing $330,000 worth of equipment.
articles.content:
A gang of masked thieves ambushed the set of the Netflix heist drama Lupin, stealing $330,000 worth of equipment.
